compatibility.notes: OLDAP-2.6 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses such as GPL.

key_requirements: Provide a copy of the license with any distribution of the software.
Do not use the trademarks of the OpenLDAP Foundation without permission.
license.name: OLDAP-2.6
obligations: Retain copyright statements and notices in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright statements, conditions, and disclaimer in binary redistributions.
Include a verbatim copy of the license in all redistributions.
Obtain written permission for using the names and trademarks of authors and copyright holders in advertising.
